t: Make a Joyful Noise to the Lord
Oh*pn sing to the Lord*s a new song, for*ld he has done marvelous things! His*ln right hand and his holy arm have*ld worked salvation for him.
The*ln Lord*s has made known his salvation; he*ld has revealed his righteousness in the sight of the nations.
He*ln has remembered his steadfast love and faithfulness to*ld the house of Israel. All*ln the ends of the earth have seen the*ld salvation of our God.
Make*pn a joyful noise to the Lord,*s all the earth; break*ld forth into joyous song and sing praises!
Sing*ln praises to the Lord*s with the lyre, with*ld the lyre and the sound of melody!
With*ln trumpets and the sound of the horn make*ld a joyful noise before the King, the Lord!*s
Let*pn the sea roar, and all that fills it; the*ld world and those who dwell in it!
Let*ln the rivers clap their hands; let*ld the hills sing for joy together
before*ln the Lord,*s for he comes to*ld judge the earth. He*ln will judge the world with righteousness, and*ld the peoples with equity.
